markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 1"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Combat Climber](/Feats.aspx?ID=768) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="General" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=78" />
<trait label="Skill" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=144" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 260 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

**Prerequisites**
Trained in [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3)

</column>

---

Your techniques allow you to fight as you climb. You’re not flat-footed while Climbing and can Climb with a hand occupied. You must still use another hand and both legs to Climb.
name: Combat Climber

<summary>
Fight more effectively as you Climb.
</summary>
summary: Fight more effectively as you Climb.

You’re not flat-footed while Climbing and can Climb with a hand occupied. You must still use another hand and both legs to Climb.
